director.name: 让-皮埃尔·别科罗 Jean-Pierre Bekolo

this_title: Afrique, la pensée en mouvement Part I
trans_title: 非洲，运动中的思想 第一部分
introduction: In October 2016, Senegalese economist, musician and poet Felwine Sarr founded the "Ateliers de la Pensée", the so-called workshops for thought, together his friend political scientist Achille Mbembe. Over four days in Dakar, they gathered together leading Senegalese intellectuals including Lydie Moudileno, Romuald Fonkoua and Nadia Yala Kisukidi for a long overdue theoretical exchange on the current issues that affect Africa - and thus also the future of planet Earth.
chinese_title: 非洲，运动中的思想 第一部分
foreign_title: Afrique, la pensée en mouvement Part I
